ygData.subject: Re: How addicted??
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me put it this way, I lead a guild. In order to lead a guild you either HAVE to be addicted or you end up having a crappy guild. =) I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Let me put it this way, I lead a guild.<br><br>In
order to lead a guild you either HAVE to be addicted or
you end up having a crappy guild. =) <br><br>I've
played since beta 4, my longest hiatus was one month. My
main is a 41 enchanter on Rallos Zek. I have a
multitude of other characters! I have a 16 enchanter, a 15
paladin, a 15 cleric, and about 10 other characters from
levels 7-11<br><br>My longest stint was probably 12
hours, I have stayed home from work and ended up
"feeling better" and playing EQ all day =) I also spend
way too many of my work hours on message
boards.<br><br>My husband keeps me in check for the most part, he
plays a bit but isn't addicted at all. He plays only
when we play together.<br><br>I would say the most
addictive thing for me is the social aspect, which will
never go away no matter what level you get to!
